description:
+40 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1 seconds.
plaintext: Slows Attack Speed of enemy champions when receiving basic attacks

name: Warden's Mail
